reviews.review: Надо шивилить мозгой! Очень круто. У меня IQ больше чем у хлебушек!
Топ игра особенно если играть в кооператив.

Заебумба, так как я являюсь гением мысли, и отцом русской демократии, прошу заметить, то игра мне подходит, ибо люблю головоломки, и когда искусственный интеллект глумится над создателем, ставлю класс!
А еще, негры - тоже люди!
one of the best games there is. if only valve could count to 3 and make more of all the games they used to make.

It is a fun game to play with and without your friends, the story mode is very fun, with a lot of twists & turns, and will have you shocked a lot of the time, I would rate this game a 9.7/10, well done Valve.

Bought this yearsss ago. Still a mind-boggling and beautiful game. Really wished they could revive the Portal series once more. If Alyx (the VR game) was created recently, why not a VR Portal game? Really would buy Portal 3.
Polecam Grę nawet dla osób które nie grały w jedynkę

If ever a game did not need a review or recommendation, it is Portal 2. Practically perfect in ways that I cannot explain, this game was a blast from start to finish - and the addition of a co-op "campaign" was a masterstroke and really does add something to the whole package.

Portal 2 is Valve at their absolute best - buy it and play it if you have not already done so.

Exquisite in every way, both in single player and co-op. Special thanks to friend KommisarRex for the co-op goodness <3 proof that its difficult to overstate a good partner.

Played on Windows 10 Pro x64 without any issues.
интересные головоломки, в некоторых можно надолго застрять.

This is a phenomenal game in every aspect. Story, writing, puzzles, and characters are all top notch. It's a must-have for every Steam library. Can't recomment this game more.

Sistemi düşük arkadaşlar ve bulmaca seven arkadaşlar oynayabilir inanılmaz bir oyun tadından yenmez bir nimet gibi. Ayrıca Co-op sistemi de gayet başarılı bir oyun. 10 üzerinden puan versem gerçekten enfes fiyatı da ucuz olduğu için 10/10 puan aldı benden tebrikler.

pros

+ clever and diverse puzzles
+ sci-fi environments and beautiful visuals
+ decent voice acting
+ there are steam achievements and cards
+ there is auto save

cons

- frequent loading screens
- when you die, you have to do same actions
- I couldn't like the platform parts
- story not interesting

Overall this is an enjoyable puzzle game.
Volvi a jugar Portal 2 y fue una nostalgia increible.
